message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is still a bit too high for me. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet at $16,000. My maximum budget remains at $12,000. I hope we can find a middle ground.
